content.p: How communication, language and texts are shaped by and shape society. Understanding how communication, languages and texts operate in social, scientific and cultural contexts is fundamental to the world we live in. As society changes, languages and texts adapt and evolve, demanding a multidisciplinary approach to their study. We focus on the use of innovative methods to produce, collect and study texts.
